category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: EPM_task_execution_mode
preference.preference_description: Determines which task execution mode should be used to process a Workflow task. Valid Values: * FOREGROUND: Processes all tasks in foreground mode. This is the default value. * BACKGROUND: Processes all tasks in background mode. * CONFIGURABLE: Processes a task according to its task template's "ExecuteAsync" property setting. If the property is set to "ON", the task will be processed in background mode. If the property is set to "OFF", the task will be processed in foreground mode.
